metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7609 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
elf_compress.c in elfutils 0.168 does not validate the zlib compression factor, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via a crafted ELF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7609` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.158-0ubuntu5.2
libasm1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.2
libdw1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.2
libelf1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: tyhicks> Support for compressed sections was first introduced in 0.165

criterions.comment: elfutils package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.158-0ubuntu5.2').
